languages.text: "Он обезумел от горя над телами собратьев. И проклятье Вульфена одолело его отважное сердце. Он стал зверем".
"He went mad with grief over the bodies of his brothers, and the Curse of the Wulfen prevailed over his valiant heart. He became a beast."
languages.original_text: "Он обезумел от горя над телами собратьев. И проклятье Вульфена одолело его отважное сердце. Он стал зверем".

traits.locale_text: "He went mad with grief over the bodies of his brothers, and the Curse of the Wulfen prevailed over his valiant heart. He became a beast."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "He went mad with grief over the bodies of his brothers, and the Curse of the Wulfen prevailed over his valiant heart. He became a beast."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "He went mad with grief over the bodies of his brothers, and the Curse of the Wulfen prevailed over his valiant heart. He became a beast."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "He went mad with grief over the bodies of his brothers, and the Curse of the Wulfen prevailed over his valiant heart. He became a beast."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “他看着兄弟们的尸体，悲痛欲绝。狼人诅咒战胜了他英勇的心，把他变成了一头凶兽。”
languages.original_text: "He went mad with grief over the bodies of his brothers, and the Curse of the Wulfen prevailed over his valiant heart. He became a beast."

traits.locale_text: “他看着兄弟们的尸体，悲痛欲绝。狼人诅咒战胜了他英勇的心，把他变成了一头凶兽。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「同胞の遺体を見て悲しみの余りに気が狂ったか、勇敢な心が狂狼の呪いに屈したかだな。獣になったんだ」
languages.original_text: "He went mad with grief over the bodies of his brothers, and the Curse of the Wulfen prevailed over his valiant heart. He became a beast."

traits.locale_text: 「同胞の遺体を見て悲しみの余りに気が狂ったか、勇敢な心が狂狼の呪いに屈したかだな。獣になったんだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Enloqueció por el dolor al ver los cuerpos de sus hermanos y la Maldición de los Wulfen se apoderó de su corazón valiente. Se convirtió en una bestia».
languages.original_text: "He went mad with grief over the bodies of his brothers, and the Curse of the Wulfen prevailed over his valiant heart. He became a beast."

traits.locale_text: «Enloqueció por el dolor al ver los cuerpos de sus hermanos y la Maldición de los Wulfen se apoderó de su corazón valiente. Se convirtió en una bestia».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Il est devenu fou de chagrin en découvrant les corps de ses frères. Son cœur vaillant n'a pas pu le sauver de la Malédiction du Wulfen et il s'est transformé en bête sauvage. »
languages.original_text: "He went mad with grief over the bodies of his brothers, and the Curse of the Wulfen prevailed over his valiant heart. He became a beast."

traits.locale_text: « Il est devenu fou de chagrin en découvrant les corps de ses frères. Son cœur vaillant n'a pas pu le sauver de la Malédiction du Wulfen et il s'est transformé en bête sauvage. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Er hat in seiner Trauer über die Leichen seiner Brüder den Verstand verloren, und der Fluch des Wulfen hat von seinem tapferen Herzen Besitz ergriffen. Er wurde zu einem Ungeheuer."
languages.original_text: "He went mad with grief over the bodies of his brothers, and the Curse of the Wulfen prevailed over his valiant heart. He became a beast."

traits.locale_text: "Er hat in seiner Trauer über die Leichen seiner Brüder den Verstand verloren, und der Fluch des Wulfen hat von seinem tapferen Herzen Besitz ergriffen. Er wurde zu einem Ungeheuer."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Kardeşlerinin cesetlerini görünce delirdi. Börü Laneti, yiğit kalbini ele geçirdi. Canavara dönüştü."
languages.original_text: "He went mad with grief over the bodies of his brothers, and the Curse of the Wulfen prevailed over his valiant heart. He became a beast."

traits.locale_text: "Kardeşlerinin bedenlerini görünce delirdi ve Börü Laneti, yiğit kalbini ele geçirdi. Bir canavara dönüştü."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
